articles.description: The records Harry Kane broke in scoring four as Bayern Munich thrash Dinamo Zagreb.
articles.title: Harry Kane: Striker's record-breaking night as Bayern score nine

articles.description: Liverpool claim an assured victory at AC Milan on their Champions League return to firmly bounce back from Saturday's shock defeat by Nottingham Forest.
articles.title: Liverpool win at AC Milan in Champions League opener

articles.title: Real Madrid vs Stuttgart: UEFA Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Unai Emery has Aston Villa fans dreaming of success after guiding his team to victory on their return to Europe's biggest stage.
articles.title: Champions League: 'The guy is a genius' – Unai Emery helps Aston Villa's dreams come true

articles.description: Can the Commonwealth Games adapt and survive, or will Glasgow prove to be the final staging post for an almost century-old institution?
articles.title: Commonwealth Games 2026: Will Glasgow be the final host?

articles.title: Juventus vs PSV: UEFA Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Manchester United recorded their biggest victory under Erik ten Hag to cruise into the EFL Cup last-16 at the expense of hapless League One outfit Barnsley.
articles.title: Manchester United 7-0 Barnsley: Rashford and Garnacho both score two

articles.description: Lancashire pace bowler Saqib Mahmood is added to the England squad for the upcoming one-day international series against Australia.
articles.title: England v Australia: Saqib Mahmood added to squad for ODI series

articles.description: Ukraine president Volodymyr Zelensky says heavyweight champion Oleksandr Usyk has been released after being detained at an airport in Poland.
articles.title: Oleksandr Usyk: Ukraine president Volodymyr Zelensky says heavyweight champion has been released after being detained at an airport

articles.description: Goalkeeper Alex McCarthy is the hero in the penalty shootout, saving Ashley Young's penalty in sudden death, as Southampton edge past Everton to reach the fourth round of the Carabao Cup.
articles.title: Southampton beat Everton on penalties to progress
